job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout NimbleltbrgtltugtltstronggtNimble is a Series A startup founded from the AI labs at Stanford and Carnegie Mellon Were pioneering the way robots learn to grasp and manipulate any objectltbrgtOur ultimate goal is to create the dark warehouse a fully automated eCommerce fulfillment center with swarms of intelligent cloudconnected robots to enable affordable sameday fulfillment for every retailer large and small In the process we aim to create one of the worlds most valuable robotics companiesltbrgtWere backed by the worlds most prestigious investors as well as AI and robotics legends like FeiFei Li Chief Scientist of AI at Google Director of Stanfords AI lab and Sebastian Thrun founder of Google X Waymo Kitty Hawk and UdacityltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout The RoleltbrgtltugtltstronggtHelp us advance our robotics moonshot by designing building and supporting features that empower machine learning algorithms and robotic systems Youll create foundational scalable systems that extend horizontally throughout the stack You will design and architect solutions to complex software engineering challenges take ownership of projects and push deployments to productionltbrgtYou will play a critical role in working with our worldclass crossfunctional team to architect and build the worlds most advanced robotic systems for the worlds biggest robotics opportunityltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDevelop largescale distributed systems and data processing systemsltligtltligtDevelop advanced algorithms to obtain optimal realtime performanceltligtltligtDesign APIs for testability scalability usability and maintainabilityltligtltligtDevelop and maintain massive data infrastructureltligtltligtProvide input on all aspects of product development from brainstorming to final deliveryltligtltligtWelcome new challenges and work independently across disciplines to both investigate issues and identify solutionsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtFast learner Aplayer great work ethic and ambitiousltligtltligtBSMSPhD in Computer Science Mathematics Electrical Engineering or a related discipline or equivalent experienceltligtltligtStrong experience writing production code in Python and Cltligtltligt3 years of experience with Linux or embedded Linux ltligtltligtExpert with LinuxltligtltligtStrong problem solver and advanced Python programmingltligtltligtAbility to identify and resolve bugs and issuesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtNice To HaveltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtParticipation in hackathons ltligtltligtExperience with robotics ROSltligtltligtMachine Learning InfrastructureltligtltligtSoftware Performance tuning and OptimizationltligtltligtRobotics Software FrameworksltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtBenefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtComprehensive medical dental and vision insurance Paid holidays generous PTO competitive wages and meaningful equity of NimbleltbrgtltstronggtltugtCultureltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe embrace challenges and strive to make the impossible possible each day Were not in this to do whats easy or to be mediocre We want to create something legendary and leave our mark on the world Were ambitious were gritty were humble and were relentlessly resourceful in pursuit of our goals If this sounds like you then you might be a great  Opportunity EmployerltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We prohibit any form of workplace discrimination based on race religion color national origin gender gender identity or expression sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status
